Open 7am - 10pm Book Now Gift Cards At GolfSpot Miami , weâ€™re redefining the way you experience golf. Our mission is to create a welcoming, community-centered space where golf enthusiasts of all skill levels can come together to play, learn, and improve. Read More Pricing Hourly Rental Pricing Book a state-of-the-art TrackMan IO golf simulator for you and up to 3 friends. Perfect for practice, play, or just having fun! $60 per hour (up to 4 people) . Book Now Packages: 6-Hour Package : $300 ($50/hour) 20-Hour Package : $900 ($45/hour). buy package Family Membership Options Our membership plan offers the ultimate value and exclusive benefits for golf enthusiasts. Please note that a one-time $200 Initiation Fee applies to join. $400/month for 10 hours ($40/hour). Sign Up NOw Membership Benefits Priority Reservations Reserve simulators up to 10 days in advance (non-members get only 7 days). Discounted Golf Lessons Enjoy individual lessons at package rates, saving you money while improving your game. Exclusive Member Events Access member-only tournaments, leagues, and social events designed for our community. Additional Rental Discounts Get 35% off simulator rentals ($39/hour) after your included 10 hours per month. Family Sharing Share your membership benefits with immediate family members, making it a great value for families. Elevate Your Game with Expert Instruction Whether you're a seasoned golfer or just starting out, our professional instructors at GolfSpot Miami are here to help you improve your skills and confidence. With personalized lessons tailored to your goals, we use TrackMan IO technology to provide accurate feedback and results-driven guidance. From one-on-one coaching to group clinics, our instruction options are designed to fit your schedule and level of play. Junior golfers are also welcome, with lessons specifically crafted to nurture young talent. Whether youâ€™re just starting out or looking to fine-tune your swing, our expert instructors are here to provide personalized coaching tailored to your goals. Powered by TrackManâ€™s cutting-edge technology, we combine data-driven insights with hands-on instruction to help you achieve measurable results. Golf lessons lessons Options Adult Golf Lessons 1-Hour Lesson : $165 Package of 6 Lessons : $810 ($135 per lesson) Package of 20 Lessons : $2,500 ($125 per lesson) Book Now Junior Golf Lessons (Ages 17 and under) 1-Hour Lesson : $135 Package of 6 Lessons : $750 ($125 per lesson) Package of 20 Lessons : $2,200 ($110 per lesson) Book Now Chat With Us About Lessons Custom Clinics Looking for group instruction or a clinic tailored to your specific needs? We offer customizable clinics for individuals, families, or groups. Contact us to design your perfect clinic. Why Choose GolfSpot for lessons? TrackMan Technology : Analyze every detail of your swing with industry-leading tools. Personalized Coaching : Tailored lessons based on your goals and progress. Convenience : Book lessons with ease and practice in our state-of-the-art simulators. Community-Focused : Learn and grow in a welcoming, inclusive environment. For all lesson or clinic inquiries: Contact Justin or Armando ( jb@golfspot.miami or armando@golfspot.miami ) Quick Links Home About Us Pricing Golf Lessons Events Contact CONTACT Justin: jb@golfspot.miami Armando: armando@golfspot.miami Copyright Â© 2025 Golf Sport. golf simulator lounge, golf lessons and indoor golf â€” Golf Spot 0 Skip to Content Golf Simulator About Us Pricing Golf Lessons Events Contact Chat On WhatsApp Open Menu Close Menu Golf Simulator About Us Pricing Golf Lessons Events Contact Chat On WhatsApp Open Menu Close Menu Golf Simulator About Us Pricing Golf Lessons Events Contact Chat On WhatsApp About Us About Us At GolfSpot Miami, we're revolutionizing the golf experience with our state-of-the-art facilities, expert instruction, and welcoming community. Our mission is to create an inclusive environment where golfers of all skill levels - from beginners to seasoned pros - can connect, learn, and thrive. We believe golf is more than just a game; it's a community that deserves to be celebrated. That's why we've designed our indoor golf facility to inspire camaraderie and foster growth. Our cutting-edge golf simulator technology allows you to play on world-famous courses from the comfort of our climate-controlled driving range. Whether you're looking to improve your swing, challenge your friends, or simply enjoy a unique golfing experience, we've got you covered. From our expert instructors to our friendly staff, everyone at GolfSpot Miami is dedicated to helping you enjoy, improve, and immerse yourself in the world of golf. So why wait? Come visit us today and experience the ultimate indoor golf destination!" Why Choose us? At GolfSpot Miami , we bring you the best in golf with TrackMan IO technology, expert lessons, and a welcoming community. World-Class Technology: TrackMan IO simulators provide accurate analytics and immersive gameplay. Flexible Bookings: Rent by the hour or become a member for exclusive benefits. Hours of Opperation Monday - Saturday 7am-10pm Sunday 9am-9pm Golf Instruction: Learn from experienced pros with tailored lessons for adults and juniors. Book Now Quick Links Home About Us Pricing Golf Lessons Events Contact CONTACT Justin: jb@golfspot.miami Armando: armando@golfspot.miami Copyright Â© 2025 Golf Sport. Website Design & Developed by Next Nova Tech

Golfspot - Customer Data Platform Golfspot Our Products Golfdashboard Who We Serve Integrations Vacancies Get in touch Login Golfspot Admin Share Golfspot Admin streamlines your golf course operations by centralizing all administrative tasks in one platform. From managing subscriptions to handling payments and communications, it simplifies complex processes and saves valuable time. Golfspot Community Use The Golfspot Community App provides members and guests with access to all essential functions through a single login, regardless of the systems running in the background. With the Golfspot Golfdashboard, you offer your golfers a modern, seamless experience. This is the standard player portal for an efficient and future-proof golf course. Golfspot Insights Analyze Golfspot Insights helps golf course managers make data-driven decisions with clear dashboards and reports. It highlights player trends, reduces churn, and optimizes operations. Turn data into actionable insights for a smarter golf course. Golfspot Connection box Connect In the complex golf industry, a best-of-breed strategy provides the flexibility to combine the best solutions available. Golfspot integrates the most suitable applications, giving you an efficient system tailored to your organization. This creates a single source of truth for all your customer data. Your Single Point Of Truth Golfspot offers the Customer Data Platform for the golf market. A Customer Data Platform helps you collect data from your tee sheet, event software, member app, and any other place your customer interact with your golf organisation. Golfspot enriches users profiles from all those applications, which allow you to understand your customer's behaviour, and let you make better decisions. Less time for administration, more time for personal attention Golfspot Your first choice in future golf software The golf world is at a crossroads. In the past, national systems were used in their own local market. In recent years, you can slowly see a change in global players in the golf software market. Those companies focus on just one solution and don't try to create an all-in-one solution. But the one thing they do, they are the best in that. This best-of-breed strategy is something that happens in every market and this transition will happen in the golf market as well. As a born mature start-up with years of experience in the international golf market, we play an independent role in this change. Golfspot Every stakeholder the same customer data Golfspot believes in the Best-of-breed strategy, whereby the golf organisation and their stakeholders can choose the applications which they want to choose, and not what the market forces them to use. One thing that is important in such an approach, make sure you have a single point of truth of your customer data. Golfspot makes sure your customer data is in sync with all the applications you want to use. No more copy/paste files, just fully automated. Golfspot Golfspot CDP One place for managing all your customer data With Golfspot CDP (Customer Data Platform), all your customer and contact information is centralised in one place. Contact details, communication history, playing data, financial information, etc. Easy to access, both for you and your colleagues. Golfspot enriches users profiles from all those applications, which allows you to understand your customer's behaviour, and let's you make better decisions. Centralized Contacts Access to all relevant information from your customers on one platform. Get from different data sources your customer data, which results in an up-to-date 360-degree persons, companies and families, customer profile. Tasks and flows Golfspot helps you with the automatic creation of tasks, so you can not forget something. As well personal to doâ€™s for you or for your team members will help you to work more efficiently. Enrich user profile Golfspot collects and unifies customer data from multiple sources to build a single, coherent, complete view of each customer. It then makes that data available to create user dashboards en personalized marketing campaigns. Control Communication Get to really know your customers: link your Gmail or Outlook account and stay up-to-date with all communication with the customer. Sent e-mails from the profile of a customer. Import/Export Mass Update Before you start using Golfspot, you already collected plenty of customer data. Import these data in your Golfspot account via import. Even historical information you can easily transfer into your Golfspot account. Access to all relevant information from your customers on one platform. Get from different data sources your customer data, which results in an up-to-date 360-degree persons, companies and families, customer profile. Golfspot helps you with the automatic creation of tasks, so you can not forget something. As well personal to doâ€™s for you or for your team members will help you to work more efficiently. Even historical information you can easily transfer into your Golfspot account. Golfspot Subscriptions Automate your (recurring) subscription billing cycle Tailor your products and services to fit your business' pricing strategy, while ensuring that your customers get exactly what they want. Provide add-ons on top of the memberships. Setup your billing frequencies and cycles and send invoices based on your own branding. Flexible Subscribtions With a mix of billing periods, in arrears/in advance billing timing, and customer-specific pricing, it can be time-consuming trying to keep the billing cycle short. Golfspot takes care of this and ensures alignment and accurate invoicing every time. Recurring Subscriptions Set recurring subscriptions for various periods. Have them generated automatically and, if necessary, sent by email or by regular mail. Reference date checker Use the Reference-date check to find  subscriptions with a conflict that differs from the contract period or the age limits. Once you find the customers with such conflicts, you can correct them and. Receive Payments Thanks to Golfspot, you are paid on time and correctly. You have access to correct payment statuses anytime and anywhere, can set automatic reminders for late payers and have customers pay online. Link Accounting Software Synchronize sent invoices to your accounting software or that of your accountant. When the invoice is set to â€œpaidâ€, the payment status is adjusted accordingly in Golfspot. Golfspot Marketplace Perfectly integrations with applications you want Other software integrates perfectly with Golfspot. No more cutting and pasting of customers data. Every stakeholder at a golf location will need more and more applications to function optimally. These applications may differ per golf organisation and/or per country. One thing they have in common, they all need their customer's data. Via our Golfspot Marketplace golf organisations can choose themself which applications they want to connect with to exchange the customer data. Self-manageable Golfspot understands how valuable it is, to have the  choice and flexibility in selecting innovative  leaders that optimise your operations. Integrate new tools in minutes. No more setup headaches and no need to push code. Tee Sheet Integration Your members and business members are always up-to-date in your favorite tee sheet. In the two-way integrations you can find all playing history of your customers in Golfspot. Federation Integrations Integration with your national federation for exchanging the member data and the WHS handicap. Event Software Integrations Link Golfspot with the best event software in the market. With this seamless integration, you will save time, time which you now can use to get more sponsorships deal for your events. Bulk e-mail, Apps, and More Golfspot makes trying new tools incredibly easy. No more costly integration processes that prevent you from using the best tools. No more cutting and pasting: Golfspot will be compatible with 100+ apps and programs that your organisation is probably already using. Golfspot makes trying new tools incredibly easy. No more costly integration processes that prevent you from using the best tools. No more cutting and pasting: Golfspot will be compatible with 100+ apps and programs that your organisation is probably already using. Golfdashboard Discover the ultimate golf dashboard - the central hub for members of your golf club. With just one login, club members gain access to all functionalities, eliminating the need to log in to various applications. From easily booking future rounds to processing scorecards and maintaining a centralized wallet balance, our dashboard offers a seamless and personalized experience that enhances convenience for your club members. Who we serve A solution for any type of golf organisation. Single Golf Facilities As golf facility you can choose the best products in the markets for your need. Golfspot will make sure that the member data is in sync. Multi-Club Collaborations Reciprocal clubs that want to have a centralized and always up-to-date CRM for booking-, event, or mobile app purposes. Multi-Course Owners Every facility has his own account, on top of that the holding company of the multi-course owner can have a centralized CRM over all facilities and can over memberships for all facilities to a member. Connection Box Partners Not all All-in-one golf software companies have their prio in connecting with 3rd parties. By connecting with Golfspot, Golfspot will do that work for them and their customers. Together you are not alone. Through 100% integration with other systems, everyone can create their ideal combination for a total solution. Vacancies We are hiring! Join us! Are you passionate about golf, technology and eager to help customers with great solutions? Are you looking for a dynamic and challenging work environment? Then join our team at Golfspot! Check out our job openings and find out how you can be part of our growing and enthusiastic company. (Job descriptions in Dutch.) About Golfspot Golfspot is a leading startup in the golf industry. We focus on improving the accessibility of software solutions in the golf industry through advanced technologies. As a fast-growing company, we strive to set the standard within the golf industry by providing high-quality service and innovative solutions to our customers. Interested? Are you ready to play a crucial role in the success of Golfspot and contribute to improving the accessibility of software solutions in the golf industry? Then apply today and become part of our ambitious team! Apply now! Send your resume and cover letter to hr@golfspot.io. Agencies do not need to apply; we recruit directly. Vacancies Integratie Specialist bij Golfspot Golfspot is een van de snelst groeiende scale-ups in de internationale golfindustrie. Wij ontwikkelen innovatieve softwareoplossingen waarmee golfbanen wereldwijd hun organisatie kunnen digitaliseren en verbeteren. Bij Golfspot geloven we dat slimme koppelingen het verschil maken. Als Integratie specialist ben jij de verbindende schakel tussen systemen, data en functionaliteit. Jij zorgt dat alles naadloos samenwerkt â€“ zodat golfbanen en hun spelers altijd kunnen vertrouwen op een soepele digitale ervaring. Je beoordeelt integratieverzoeken op haalbaarheid, denkt actief mee over oplossingen, en zorgt dat onze Golfspot Integrations (APIâ€™s en modules) op een soepele manier worden ingezet. Dankzij jouw inzet worden clubs sneller aangesloten en systemen slimmer verbonden. Jouw verantwoordelijkheden Ontwikkelen en beheren van integraties tussen verschillende systemen en platformen Bedenken van innovatieve oplossingen voor uitdagende integratievraagstukken Samenwerken met zowel technische als niet-technische collegaâ€™s om processen te optimaliseren Meedenken over de schaalbaarheid en toekomstbestendigheid van ons platform Jouw profiel HBO werk- en denkniveau (richting IT, software engineering of data-integratie). Ervaring met APIâ€™s, integraties en datastromen. Goede communicatieve vaardigheden in zowel Nederlands als Engels. Affiniteit met SaaS-platforms en data-gedreven werken. Analytisch, proactief en oplossingsgericht. Wat bieden wij Werken in een snelgroeiende scale-ups met internationale klanten. Directe impact op het succes van Golfspot en onze klanten. Veel ruimte voor eigen initiatief en persoonlijke ontwikkeling. Golflessen inbegrepen â€“ ook als je nog nooit een club hebt aangeraakt ðŸ˜‰ Flexibiliteit, informele sfeer en een gedreven team. Een marktconform salaris Aanvullen informatie Kantoor: Breda Uren: 32-40 uur per week Startdatum: In overleg Word jij onze technische bruggenbouwer in Europa en Noord-Amerika? Stuur je CV en korte motivatie naar hr@golfspot.io. of neem contact op voor meer informatie. Medior Back-end Developer bij Golfspot Functieomschrijving Als Medior Back-end Developer bij Golfspot ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen, onderhouden en verbeteren van de server-side applicaties en databases van ons platform. Je werkt nauw samen met ons front-end team en andere stakeholders om te zorgen voor een robuuste en schaalbare back-end die de groei van onze webapplicaties ondersteunt. Je speelt een essentiÃ«le rol in de doorontwikkeling van ons platform en zorgt ervoor dat de back-end technologieÃ«n optimaal samenwerken met de front-end. Verantwoordelijkheden Ontwikkelen en onderhouden van back-end applicaties met PHP en andere server-side technologieÃ«n. Werken met databases zoals MySQL of PostgreSQL en zorgen voor een efficiÃ«nte data-opslag en -verwerking. Samenwerken met de front-end developers om een naadloze integratie te realiseren tussen front-end en back-end. Optimaliseren van de prestaties van de back-end systemen en het oplossen van technische problemen. Bijdragen aan de verbetering van de back-end architectuur en het standaardiseren van ontwikkelprocessen en -technologieÃ«n Vereisten Minimaal 2-3 jaar ervaring als Back-end Developer, met een sterke focus op PHP. Ervaring met databases zoals MySQL of PostgreSQL en kennis van versiebeheer (Git). Bekendheid met frameworks zoals Laravel is een pre. Ervaring met API-ontwikkeling en integratie. Zelfstandige werkhouding, sterke analytische vaardigheden en een passie voor het oplossen van technische vraagstukken. Wat bieden wij Een uitdagende en dynamische werkomgeving binnen een snelgroeiende startup. Kansen voor persoonlijke en professionele groei en ontwikkeling. Een competitief salaris en uitstekende secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden. Nog geen golf ervaring? Dan bieden wij uiteraard golflessen aan. Aanvullende informatie Werkuren: Full time (40-uur) Locatie Breda Ben je enthousiast over deze functie? Stuur je CV en motivatie naar hr@golfspot.io. en wordt onderdeel van ons innovatieve team bij Golfspot! Onboarding Specialist bij Golfspot Golfspot is een van de snelst groeiende scale-ups in de internationale golfindustrie. Wij ontwikkelen innovatieve softwareoplossingen waarmee golfbanen wereldwijd hun organisatie kunnen digitaliseren en verbeteren. Ter uitbreiding van ons team zijn wij op zoek naar een Onboarding Specialist die nieuwe klanten begeleidt tijdens de implementatie Ã©n helpt bij supportvragen. Jij zorgt ervoor dat onze klanten een vliegende start maken en zich direct welkom voelen. Our Picks Sign Up for All InsideGOLF Join Now Log In 13 Golf-Loving CEOs Who Run Fortune 500 Companies SHARE Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share by Email Search Go ad free on Golf.com Get InsideGOLF x News 13 Golf-Loving CEOs Who Run Fortune 500 Companies By Josh Sens June 7, 2016 Comcast chief executive Brian Roberts carries an 8 handicap. His playing partners have included President Obama. Getty Images // Ezra Shaw This week our friends down the hallÂ at Fortune released the latest edition of the Fortune 500 , their annual compilation of the 500 largest companies in the United States. Every chief executive mentioned on the list makes more money in a year than most people earn in a lifetime. But who cares what theyâ€™re worth? All that really matters is what kind of golf game they have. Here are 13 FortuneÂ 500 CEOsÂ who are as at home in the grill room as they are in the boardroom. John Watson, Chevron At the 2016 AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am, Watson holed a wedge on the 18th for eagle, an excellent shot by an excellent golfer, who entered the event with a 2 handicap index. Brian Roberts, Comcast Roberts has been spotted on the lush fairways of the Vineyard Golf Club on Marthaâ€™s Vineyard, playing with President Barack Obama. Because POTUS has a handicap of 17, next time the two men peg it, Roberts (8.1) had best give the Commander in Cleats some shots. Ian Read, Pfizer Like the game itself, Read is Scottish born. Heâ€™s not a bad stick, either. His index has been listed as low as 8.2. Steve Kandarian, MetLife A view from the MetLife blimp (or from anywhere else, for that matter) would show Kandarian to be a 16 index who plays his pegs his ball at two upscale private clubs: Somerset Hills in New Jersey and the Lost Tree Club in Florida. Edward Stack, Dickâ€™s Sporting Goods Dickâ€™s is big into golf, and so is its CEO, whose club affiliations include such high-cachet outposts as Oakmont, the Medalist and Old Sandwich, where his index is listed as a cool 7.0. Greg Creed, Yum Brands Soon after taking over as CEO, Creed relaxed the company dress code by showing up to work in blue jeans. Letâ€™s see him try that at Las Colinas Country Club, the high-end Texas club where heâ€™s listed as an 11.3. Walter Bettinger, Charles Schwab When Charles Schwab named Bettinger as his successor, he gave the corner office to a lesser golfer. Not that Bettingerâ€™s a slouch; he plays off 11.7. But in a head-to-head match against olâ€™ Chuck (9.1), the company founder wins on paper every time. Lloyd Blankfein, Goldman Sachs Not only did his investment firm get a multi-billion dollar federal bailout, the guy also gets a bounty of strokes. His handicap at Sebonack Golf Club, the exorbitant Long Island club where he belongs, is listed as a 23.4. Virginia Rometty, IBM The third woman admitted to Augusta National Golf Club (after Condoleezza Rice and Darla Moore), Rometty has been described by a fellow Augusta member as having a â€œnice swing.â€Â Apparently, looks arenâ€™t everything. Her index is an unsightly 35.4. Warren Buffett, Berkshire Hathaway Being a member of Augusta National means youâ€™ve got a lot of money. It doesnâ€™t mean youâ€™ve got a lot of game. â€œLucky to break 100 would be a very generous appraisal of my current abilities,â€Â Buffett told Fortune five years ago. He was 80 at the time. As with Berkshire Hathaway stock, itâ€™s unlikely his index has dropped since then. James Gorman, Morgan Stanley Hereâ€™s one from the must-be-nice department. Gorman, whose 2013 salary was a reported $18 million, has affiliations with three swish private clubs in the New York area alone, including prestigious National Golf Links. Thatâ€™s hard to relate to. But his 14.7 index is well within the range of the regular guy. Greg Henslee, Oâ€™Reilly Automotive As the head honcho at Oâ€™Reilly, Henslee has to deal with plenty of moving parts. But his swing seems to work in reasonable sync. He plays off an 11.8. John T. Chambers, Cisco Chambers runs the largest networking company in the world. He also has a pretty good network of his own. Or youâ€™d expect for a guy who plays out of Clint Eastwood-owned Tehama Golf Club, where he carries an index of 14.5.
